name: Google Chat Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Chat Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Google Chat API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Google Chat API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: serviceAccount

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many spaces the caller is a member of

memberId.name: memberId
memberId.description: Member to be retrieved in the form "spaces/*/members/*"
memberId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Member ID | 作用: Member to be retrieved in the form "spaces/*/members/*" | (必填项)

spaceId.name: spaceId
spaceId.description: Space resource name, in the form "spaces/*". Example: spaces/AAAAMpdlehY. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
spaceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Space Name or ID | 作用: Space resource name, in the form "spaces/*". Example: spaces/AAAAMpdlehY. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.description: Whether to pass the update fields object as JSON
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 作用: Whether to pass the update fields object as JSON | 默认值: False

messageUi.name: messageUi
messageUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

jsonNotice.displayName: See Google Chat Guide To Creating Messages
jsonNotice.name: jsonNotice
jsonNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: See Google Chat Guide To Creating Messages

messageJson.name: messageJson
messageJson.description: Message input as JSON Object or JSON String
messageJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message (JSON) | 作用: Message input as JSON Object or JSON String | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: requestId (值: None) - A unique request ID for this message. If a message has already been created in the space with this request ID, the subsequent request will return the existing message and no new message will be created.

messageId.name: messageId
messageId.description: Resource name of the message to be updated, in the form "spaces//messages/"
messageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message ID | 作用: Resource name of the message to be updated, in the form "spaces//messages/" | (必填项)

updateFieldsUi.name: updateFieldsUi
updateFieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

updateFieldsJson.name: updateFieldsJson
updateFieldsJson.description: Message input as JSON Object or JSON String
updateFieldsJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields (JSON) | 作用: Message input as JSON Object or JSON String | (必填项)

responseType.name: responseType
responseType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Type | 默认值: approval
available_options: Approval (值: approval) - User can approve/disapprove from within the message
Free Text (值: freeText) - User can submit a response via a form
Custom Form (值: customForm) - User can submit a response via a custom form

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Define Form | 默认值: fields

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Approval Options | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: responseFormTitle (值: None) - Title of the form that the user can access to provide their response
responseFormDescription (值: None) - Description of the form that the user can access to provide their response
responseFormCustomCss (值: None) - Override default styling of the response form with CSS
limitWaitTime (值: None) - Whether the workflow will automatically resume execution after the specified limit type
appendAttribution (值: None) - Whether to include the phrase "This message was sent automatically with n8n" to the end of the message
